channel.title: An idea to fix a glitch
channel.description: ok my idea is to force a player to log off when they die on pimpscape to prevent the glitch where it looks like they are noclipping. is there a way to do this?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 01:13:37 AM[/size][hr]help plz?
